titleStmt.title: The necessity of divine instructions in point of reformation discovered in a sermon preached before the Right Honorable, the Lord Mayor, the Right Worshipful, the sheriffs and aldermen, with other worthy citizens of the city of London, at a solemn anniversary meeting, April 4, 1648 / by John Cardell.
titleStmt.author: Cardell, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
